title: Arbor Snowboards :: 2016 Product Profiles - Shreddy Krueger
description: The Shreddy Krueger is the first time we’ve built our award winning System Rocker design onto a performance gun shape. This thing floats through pow like a bat on a power boat escaping the flaming inferno of hell. Meanwhile, its deadly versatility makes this a great board for all conditions and terrain. Don’t sleep on this one because if you do, the Shreddy Kreuger will be slashing the turns of your dreams without you.
tags: Shreddy Krueger,Snowboarding,Arbor,Arbor Snowboards,Rocker System,Product Video,Product Profiles
